sentences.sentence: Place the diced pancetta in a heated pan and stir-fry until they are crispy.
sentences.translation: 炒锅加热，放入烟肉丁炒至香脆。

sentences.sentence: Crisp skinned white snapper, green beans, pancetta & asparagus withalmond lemon sauce $36
sentences.translation: 脆皮白鳟鱼，绿豌豆，意大利培根和芦笋配柠檬杏仁沙司。

sentences.sentence: Lynette: And he makes them with pancetta and garlic and olive oil. It's really, really good.
sentences.translation: 他把他们和意式培根还有大蒜和橄榄油放一起，真的很好吃！
